name: Suicide Time
description:
Hello!

Thanks for checking out the game I made for Weekly Game Jam #130. It's called Suicide Time, because the character can die at will and use that to its advantage.

Main Features - 

  • Fun platforming
  • Simple Puzzles
  • Very Short

Tips -

  • Your character can jump from anywhere. Midair, from side of platforms etc. He can only jump once between every landing though.
  • Follow the flickering lights, they lead you to the next level
  • If stuck anywhere, just restart by pressing 'R'
  • Have Fun!
